import {useState,useEffect} from 'react';import API from './api';import TaskItem from './components/TaskItem';export default function App(){const [tasks,setTasks]=useState([]);const [title,setTitle]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{API.get('/').then(r=>setTasks(r.data));},[]);return(

Task Manager

setTitle(e.target.value)}/>{tasks.map(t=>API.put('/'+id).then(r=>setTasks(tasks.map(x=>x._id===id?r.data:x)))} deleteTask={id=>API.delete('/'+id).then(()=>setTasks(tasks.filter(x=>x._id!==id)))}/>)}
)}
